input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral)

Item features:
Snap-fit visor
In-Mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner
Acu Dial fit system
20 vents
input_text.Response A:
Here's a fun product description for you:

This cool pink helmet has a snap-fit visor to protect your eyes from the sun. It's made with a strong outer shell and soft lining that fits your head perfectly. The helmet has 20 vents to keep you cool and comfortable while you ride your bike. It's a great choice for kids who love riding their bikes and want to look cool while they do it!
input_text.Response B:
Sure thing! Here's a product description for the Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet in short, simple language:

"Wow, look at this cool helmet! It's pink and purple and has a special visor that snaps into place. It's super light and has lots of air holes to keep your head cool. Plus, it's really safe and has a special fit system to make sure it's comfy. It's perfect for your bike rides!"

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: Both responses are bad and misleading as they claimed the helmets are pin. However, the helmets are Pearl White/Red Floral.
